hero.title: Ibhulogi Yebhizinisi ye-Dott
hero.subtitle: Funda ukuthi ungawuphatha kanjani umnotho webhizinisi lakho nge-Dott. Thola amathiphu, ukuqonda namasu okukhulisa ibhizinisi lakho.

newsletter.title: Bhalisa ukuthola iphephandaba lethu mayelana nezibuyekezo zomkhiqizo namabhulogi amasha!

noArticles: Azikho izihloko ezitholakele ezihambisana nezinto ozifunayo.

profitLoss.title: Ukuqonda Inzuzo Nokulahlekelwa: Umhlahlandlela Ojabulisayo Wabanikazi Bamabhizinisi
profitLoss.excerpt: Thola ukuthi ungasifunda futhi usiqonde kanjani isitatimende sakho se-P&L ngaphandle kokulala. Sithembisa ukwenza kube mnandi!

expenses.title: Landelela Izindleko Zebhizinisi Njengochwepheshe: Izinyathelo ezi-5 Ezilula
expenses.excerpt: Funda ukuthi ungalandelela kanjani yonke into ngaphandle kokulahlekelwa umqondo. Futhi, thola ukuthi yiziphi izindleko ezingakonga imali ngesikhathi sentela!

taxDeductions.title: Izinciphiso Zentela Ezifihliwe Okufanele Zonke Amabhizinisi Amancane Azazi
taxDeductions.excerpt: Yeka ukushiya imali etafuleni! Thola izinciphiso zentela ezisemthethweni eziphoswa abaningi abanikazi bamabhizinisi.

inventory.title: Guqula Ukuphathwa Kwempahla Yakho Ngokuskena Amabhakhodi
inventory.excerpt: Valelisa ekubaleni ngesandla! Funda ukuthi ukuskena kwebhakhodi kungaguqula kanjani ukuphathwa kwempahla yakho.

mobile.title: Qhuba Ibhizinisi Lakho Lonke Kusuka Ocingweni Lwakho: Inguquko Yeselula
mobile.excerpt: Thola ukuthi ungalawula kanjani ama-invoyisi, ulandelele impahla, futhi uphathe izinkokhelo - konke kusuka ku-smartphone yakho!

customerRelationships.title: Ukwakha Ubudlelwane Bamakhasimende Obuhlala Isikhathi Eside: I-CRM Yenziwe Lula
customerRelationships.excerpt: Funda ukuthi ungenza kanjani amakhasimende abuye ngaphandle kwesoftware eyinkimbinkimbi noma amathuluzi abizayo.
